sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import logoImage from '../../assets/images/logo_sorted.png' const Footer: React.FC = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear() const scrollToSection = (sectionId: string) => { const element = document.getElementById(sectionId) if (element) { const offset = 80 // Account for fixed navbar const elementPosition = element.getBoundingClientRect().top const offsetPosition = elementPosition + window.pageYOffset - offset window.scrollTo({ top: offsetPosition, behavior: 'smooth', }) } } const quickLinks = [ { id: 'services', label: 'Services' }, { id: 'portfolio', label: 'Our Work' }, { id: 'about', label: 'About' }, { id: 'contact', label: 'Contact' }, ] const socialLinks = [ { name: 'Facebook', url: 'https://www.facebook.com/sortedorganizedbycm', icon: ( ), }, { name: 'Instagram', url: 'https://www.instagram.com/sortedorganizedbycm', icon: ( ), }, { name: 'LinkedIn', url: 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/sortedorganizedbycm', icon: ( ), }, ] return (
{/* Main Footer Content */}
{/* Brand */}

Transform your space, transform your life. Professional organization services that bring lasting order and beauty to your home.

{/* Social Links */}
{socialLinks.map((social) => ( {social.icon} ))}
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

    {quickLinks.map((link) => (
    • ))}
{/* Contact Info */}

Get in Touch

sortedorganizedbycm@gmail.com (612) 308-4781
Twin Cities Metro Area
{/* Bottom Bar */}

© {currentYear} Sorted & Organized by CM. All rights reserved.

) } export default Footer
